divs: Sighting DetailsI was at home in my bedroom. Had finish taking a shower and was about to eat a snack before going to bed. But before I decided to close the window because it was getting cold in the room and plus I never leave my windows open. As I was about to close the window. I notice a star in the sky. This star wasn't like the other ones. This one was much much brighter and bigger, plus it was in a part of the sky that in all of my years living here. I've never had seen a star that big and bright there. That's what really caught my attention. I was calm not excited normal.So I open the window completely to get a better view of it. Then I decided to take picture's and video of it. So I took out my Fujifilm finepix 18x camera to take pictures. The first couple of pictures I took without the tri-pod, but then decided to put the camera on it's tripod to take better steady pictures. So I took a few pictures, then decide to take a video of this star. So I did about 7-9 minutes of video I believe. After I had taken photos and a video of this star. I closed my window and pull down the venetian blinds stored the camera away and went to bed. I didn't think about it. I decided to check the pictures and video the following day. So that's what I did. The following day I downloaded the pictures and video into my computer and saw what I had capture on video and on photos. I forgot to mention the object after I closed my window it remained there. Don't know for how long.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around November 14th 2012
Summary: Star-like UFO over the bronx, New York
